issue.title: [C++] Revert changes to qualify duration in vendored date code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5346](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5346). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The changes where made to get PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3644 compiling without using "duration" type constructor.  Vendored code changes are bad ...

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5346?focusedCommentId=16841952) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
